name: php-cs-fixer
description: PHP CS Fixer extension for VS Code, php formatter, php code beautify tool

php-cs-fixer.executablePath.description: Points to the php-cs-fixer exectuable, eg: win: php-cs-fixer.bat, other: php-cs-fixer; or points to php-cs-fixer.phar path, eg: /full/path/of/php-cs-fixer.phar

php-cs-fixer.executablePathWindows.description: Points to the php-cs-fixer exectuable on Windows environments, eg: php-cs-fixer.bat. Useful if you are sharing settings among different environments.

php-cs-fixer.config.description: config file(.php_cs) can place in workspace root folder or .vscode folder or any other folder(full path)

php-cs-fixer.onsave.description: Execute PHP CS Fixer on save

php-cs-fixer.autoFixByBracket.description: when press down the key } auto fix the code in the brackets {}

php-cs-fixer.autoFixBySemicolon.description: when press down the key ; auto fix the code at the current line

php-cs-fixer.formatHtml.description: whether formatting html at the same time

php-cs-fixer.documentFormattingProvider.description: register php document formatting provider, right mouse-click context menu, show as 'Format Document', after changing this option you should restart your editor.
